attributes.action: Ensure vaccine injured employees are financially protected for life
attributes.additional_details:
If the government is insistent that workers must take this new and still experimental treatment as part of employment they must guarantee that in the event of a rare reaction workers will be adequately compensated for life. 
Even if the risk is less than 1 in 10 million, there is still risk! The government should not force people to take this risk, but if the are going to then workers must be covered in law.
attributes.background: Anyone who takes the Covid 19 vaccine as part of a government mandated condition of employment, that then or years later develops any known or unknown, listed side effects will receive their full wage for the rest of their life or family members will receive a lump sum of this in the event of death.
